title: Dreadful Episodes
description: Happenstance Theater presents a hilarious and virtuosic theatrical collage adorned with live music and physical comedy, inspired by the illustrations of Edward Gorey. These dark comedic vignettes include precocious children, a s√©ance, and other fancies that will transport you to a world where unseen dangers cause laughter. Join us this autumn when the veil is thin to enjoy all things witty and macabre.
address: 59E59 Theaters, a quick block from SUBWAY 4/5/6 N/W/R at 59 St.
